title: Crown of Vengeance
description: Strange mists engulf Janus Roland, Erika Laesig, Mershad Shahab, and others in a quiet midwestern U.S. town. In the new world of Ave, war looms over both Saxany and the Five Realms. The captivating Unifier attracts forces to fight in the skies, upon the seas, on land, and even in places non-physical in nature, with races familiar and new.
author: Stephen Zimmer
